data.name: Honorable Heart
data.description:
Jeanne regenerates 1/1.5/2/2.5 health per second while out of combat based on her current level.
At level 3 Jeanne takes 45% less damage from ranged attacks; at level 4 this is increased to 60%.

data.name: Jeanne's Companions
data.description: Achieve level 3 with Jeanne d'Arc to select between Champions and Riders to be trained at the keep.

data.name: Journey of a Hero
data.description:
Jeanne generates experience for completing tasks such as gathering resources, constructing buildings, hunting boar, capturing Sacred Sites, and participating in combat. Jeanne also gains a small trickle of experience over time.
After earning sufficient experience Jeanne can level up, becoming more powerful and gaining access to unique abilities.

data.name: Pilgrim Destination
data.description: Select a Sacred Site for your Pilgrims to travel to. Pilgrims cannot travel to a Sacred Site captured by an enemy.

data.name: Pilgrim Loan (Large)
data.description: Provide a loan to Pilgrims that will be repaid at a rate of 900 gold per minute for 4 minutes

data.name: Pilgrim Loan (Medium)
data.description: Provide a loan to Pilgrims that will be repaid at a rate of 600 gold per minute for 3 minutes

data.name: Pilgrim Loan (Small)
data.description: Provide a loan to Pilgrims that will be repaid at a rate of 300 gold per minute for 2 minutes

data.name: Ring the Town Bell
data.description: Alerts and orders all nearby Villagers to automatically seek shelter in the nearest garrisonable building.

data.name: Treasure Towers
data.description: Increases the gold generation of Monasteries, Sacred Sites and Pilgrims by 20% within the aura of a Fortress.

data.name: (translation not found) (undefined)
data.description: (translation not found) (undefined)

data.name: Abbey Healing
data.description: Heals nearby out of combat units by 6 every 1 seconds.

data.name: Conversion
data.description:
Attempts to convert enemy units within range of this Monk to your control.
Cooldown: 120 Seconds.

data.name: Detonate
data.description: Detonate the ship.

data.name: King's College
data.description: Granted +15% cheaper research costs by the King's College.

data.name: Lancaster Castle
data.description: Manors gain +500 health and an arrowslit emplacement when in influence of the Lancaster Castle.
